 ►►► This video ◄◄◄  
This week we discuss what Trump means for tech, from antitrust to tariffs, EVs and more, the Mozilla Foundation laid off 30% of its employees and Corning, the maker of Gorilla Glass has an antitrust problem.

Episode 223 

This video on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/tfc-what-trump-means-for-tech
